name: Perry LaBoone
review: We've had the pleasure of doing business with Hardwood Specialists on two occasions. Terry and his team refinished our floors and installed oak upstairs. Excellent work.

name: Nancy Sidow
review: We used Hardwood Specialists in our newly purchased home. Terri helped us choose the right product, and the install team did a great job.

name: Michael Ferega
review: The installation of new floors and refinishing was painless. Fair price, great team, and completed on time.
